   22: -module(lasp_SUITE).
   23: -author("Christopher Meiklejohn <christopher.meiklejohn@gmail.com>").
   24: 
   25: %% common_test callbacks
   26: -export([%% suite/0,
   27:          init_per_suite/1,
   28:          end_per_suite/1,
   29:          init_per_testcase/2,
   30:          end_per_testcase/2,
   31:          all/0]).
   32: 
   33: %% tests
   34: -compile([export_all]).
   35: 
   36: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   37: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
   38: -include_lib("kernel/include/inet.hrl").
   39: 
   40: %% ===================================================================
   41: %% common_test callbacks
   42: %% ===================================================================
   43: 
   44: init_per_suite(_Config) ->
   45:     %% Start Lasp on the runner and enable instrumentation.
   46:     lasp_support:start_runner(),
   47: 
   48:     _Config.
   49: 
   50: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   51:     %% Stop Lasp on the runner.
   52:     lasp_support:stop_runner(),
   53: 
   54:     _Config.
   55: 
   56: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   57:     ct:pal("Beginning case: ~p", [Case]),
   58: 
   59:     %% Runner must start and stop in between test runs as well, to
   60:     %% ensure that we clear the membership list (otherwise, we could
   61:     %% delete the data on disk, but this is cleaner.)
   62:     lasp_support:start_runner(),
   63: 
   64:     Nodes = lasp_support:start_nodes(Case, Config),
   65:     [{nodes, Nodes}|Config].
   66: 
   67: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   68:     ct:pal("Case finished: ~p", [Case]),
   69: 
   70:     lasp_support:stop_nodes(Case, Config),
   71: 
   72:     %% Runner must start and stop in between test runs as well, to
   73:     %% ensure that we clear the membership list (otherwise, we could
   74:     %% delete the data on disk, but this is cleaner.)
   75:     lasp_support:stop_runner().
   76: 
   77: all() ->
   78:     [
   79:      contracted_latency_test,
   80:      uncontracted_latency_test,
   81:      latency_with_reads_test,
   82:      sql_parser_test,
   83:      sql_combined_view_test,
   84:      sql_simple_contracted_latency_test,
   85:      sql_simple_uncontracted_latency_test,
   86:      sql_join_contracted_latency_test,
   87:      sql_join_uncontracted_latency_test,
   88:      stream_test,
   89:      query_test,
   90:      ivar_test,
   91:      orset_test,
   92:      awset_ps_test,
   93:      dynamic_ivar_test,
   94:      monotonic_read_test,
   95:      map_test,
   96:      filter_test,
   97:      union_test,
   98:      product_test,
   99:      intersection_test,
  100:      membership_test,
  101:      enforce_once_test
  102:     ].
  103: 
  104: -include("lasp.hrl").
  105: 
  106: %% ===================================================================
  107: %% tests
  108: %% ===================================================================
  109: 
  110: -define(AWSET_PS, awset_ps).
  111: -define(COUNTER, pncounter).
  112: -define(LATENCY_ITERATIONS, 2200).
  113: -define(TRIM, {trim, 100, 100}).
  114: 
  115: -define(ID, <<"myidentifier">>).
  116: 
  117: contracted_latency_test(_Config) ->
  118:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  119:         true ->
  120:             Res = latency_test_case(5, contraction, no_read, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS),
  121:             write_csv(path_contraction, contraction, Res, ?TRIM);
  122: 
  123:         _ -> ok
  124:     end.
  125: 
  126: uncontracted_latency_test(_Config) ->
  127:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  128:         true ->
  129:             Res = latency_test_case(5, no_contraction, no_read, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS),
  130:             write_csv(path_contraction, no_contraction, Res, ?TRIM);
  131: 
  132:         _ -> ok
  133:     end.
  134: 
  135: latency_with_reads_test(_Config) ->
  136:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  137:         true ->
  138:             Res = latency_test_case(5, contraction, random_reads, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS),
  139:             write_csv(path_contraction, contraction_with_reads, Res, ?TRIM);
  140: 
  141:         _ -> ok
  142:     end.
  143: 
  144: sql_parser_test(_Config) ->
  145:     ok = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_table_with_values(users, [
  146:         [{name, "Foo"}, {age, 22}],
  147:         [{name, "Bar"}, {age, 9}],
  148:         [{name, "Baz"}, {age, 20}]
  149:     ]),
  150: 
  151:     ?assertMatch([["Baz", 20], ["Bar", 9], ["Foo", 22]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(users, [name, age])),
  152: 
  153:     {ok, Id1} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select name from users where age = 22 or age < 10"),
  154: 
  155:     %% Stabilize
  156:     timer:sleep(100),
  157: 
  158:     ?assertMatch([["Bar"], ["Foo"]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id1, [name])),
  159: 
  160:     {ok, Id2} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select name from users where age <= 22 and age => 10"),
  161: 
  162:     %% Stabilize
  163:     timer:sleep(100),
  164: 
  165:     ?assertMatch([["Baz"], ["Foo"]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id2, [name])),
  166: 
  167:     {ok, Id3} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select name from users where age < 22 and age > 19"),
  168: 
  169:     %% Stabilize
  170:     timer:sleep(100),
  171: 
  172:     ?assertMatch([["Baz"]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id3, [name])),
  173: 
  174:     {ok, Id4} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select name, age from users where age < 22 and age > 19"),
  175: 
  176:     %% Stabilize
  177:     timer:sleep(100),
  178: 
  179:     ?assertMatch([["Baz", 20]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id4, [name, age])),
  180: 
  181:     {ok, Id5} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select name, age from users where name = 'Foo' or name = 'Baz'"),
  182: 
  183:     %% Stabilize
  184:     timer:sleep(100),
  185: 
  186:     ?assertMatch([["Baz", 20], ["Foo", 22]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id5, [name, age])),
  187: 
  188:     ok.
  189: 
  190: sql_combined_view_test(_Config) ->
  191:     ok = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_table_with_values(classics, [
  192:         [{title, "Breathless"}, {year, 1960}, {rating, 80}],
  193:         [{title, "A Woman Is a Woman"}, {year, 1961}, {rating, 76}],
  194:         [{title, "Masculin Feminin"}, {year, 1966}, {rating, 77}],
  195:         [{title, "La Chinoise"}, {year, 1967}, {rating, 73}]
  196:     ]),
  197: 
  198:     {OutputId, Type}=Output = lasp_sql_materialized_view:generate_identifier(filtered),
  199:     %% have to declare the value explicitly, otherwise query will fail on write
  200:     lasp:declare(OutputId, Type),
  201:     {ok, Id1} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Output,
  202:                                                   "select title, rating from classics where year => 1960 and year <= 1965"),
  203: 
  204:     %% Stabilize
  205:     timer:sleep(100),
  206: 
  207:     ?assertMatch([["A Woman Is a Woman"], ["Breathless"]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id1, [title])),
  208: 
  209:     {ok, Id2} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select title from filtered where rating => 80"),
  210: 
  211:     %% Stabilize
  212:     timer:sleep(100),
  213: 
  214:     ?assertMatch([["Breathless"]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id2, [title])),
  215: 
  216:     ok.
  217: 
  218: latency_test_case(NVertices, Optimization, RandomReadsConfig, Iterations) ->
  219:     Ids = generate_path(NVertices, ?COUNTER),
  220:     case Optimization of
  221:         no_contraction ->
  222:             %% Disable automatic contraction
  223:             lasp_config:set(automatic_contraction, false),
  224:             %% Force a full cleaving before starting the test
  225:             lasp_dependence_dag:cleave_all();
  226:         _ ->
  227:             %% Enable automatic contraction
  228:             lasp_config:set(automatic_contraction, true),
  229:             %% Force a contraction before starting the test
  230:             lasp_dependence_dag:contract()
  231:     end,
  232:     First = lists:nth(1, Ids),
  233:     Intermediate = case RandomReadsConfig of
  234:         random_reads ->
  235:             lists:sublist(Ids, 2, length(Ids) - 2);
  236:         _ -> []
  237:     end,
  238:     Last = lists:last(Ids),
  239:     latency_run_case(Iterations, [], RandomReadsConfig,
  240:                      First, Intermediate, Last, increment, undefined).
  241: 
  242: latency_run_case(0, Acc, _, _, _, _, _, _) -> lists:reverse(Acc);
  243: latency_run_case(Iterations, Acc, RandomReadsConfig,
  244:                  From, Intermediate, To, Mutator, Threshold0) ->
  245: 
  246:     Threshold = {strict, Threshold0},
  247:     MutateAndRead = fun(Src, Dst, Mutation, Thr) ->
  248:         lasp:update(Src, Mutation, a),
  249:         lasp:read(Dst, Thr)
  250:     end,
  251:     case RandomReadsConfig of
  252:         no_read -> ok;
  253:         random_reads ->
  254:             %% Read from a random intermediate vertex every 10 iterations
  255:             case (Iterations rem 10) =:= 0 of
  256:                 true ->
  257:                     RPos = lasp_support:puniform(length(Intermediate)),
  258:                     RandomChoice = lists:nth(RPos, Intermediate),
  259:                     lasp:read(RandomChoice, undefined);
  260:                 _ -> ok
  261:             end
  262:     end,
  263:     {Time, {ok, {_, _, _, NewThreshold}}} = timer:tc(MutateAndRead, [From, To, Mutator, Threshold]),
  264: 
  265:     latency_run_case(Iterations - 1, [Time | Acc], RandomReadsConfig,
  266:                      From, Intermediate, To, Mutator, NewThreshold).
  267: 
  268: 
  269: sql_simple_contracted_latency_test(_Config) ->
  270:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  271:         true ->
  272:             %% Topology.
  273:             Initial = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(initial),
  274:             Middle = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(middle),
  275:             Final = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(final),
  276: 
  277:             {ok, _} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Middle,
  278:                                                         "select a, b, c from initial where a > 0"),
  279: 
  280:             {ok, _} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Final,
  281:                                                         "select b, c from middle where b = 'foo'"),
  282: 
  283:             {ok, ResultTable} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select c from final where c < 20"),
  284: 
  285:             Res = sql_latency_test_case(contraction, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS, Initial, ResultTable, [{a, 1}, {b, "foo"}, {c, 0}]),
  286:             write_csv(sql_simple_queries, contraction, Res, ?TRIM);
  287: 
  288:         _ -> ok
  289:     end.
  290: 
  291: sql_simple_uncontracted_latency_test(_Config) ->
  292:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  293:         true ->
  294:             %% Topology.
  295:             Initial = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(initial),
  296:             Middle = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(middle),
  297:             Final = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(final),
  298: 
  299:             {ok, _} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Middle,
  300:                                                         "select a, b, c from initial where a > 0"),
  301: 
  302:             {ok, _} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Final,
  303:                                                         "select b, c from middle where b = 'foo'"),
  304: 
  305:             {ok, ResultTable} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select c from final where c < 20"),
  306: 
  307:             Res = sql_latency_test_case(no_contraction, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS, Initial, ResultTable, [{a, 1}, {b, "foo"}, {c, 0}]),
  308:             write_csv(sql_simple_queries, no_contraction, Res, ?TRIM);
  309: 
  310:         _ -> ok
  311:     end.
  312: 
  313: sql_join_contracted_latency_test(_Config) ->
  314:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  315:         true ->
  316:             %% Topology.
  317:             Initial = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(initial),
  318:             Final = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(final),
  319:             {ok, _} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Final,
  320:                                                         "select a, b, c from initial where a > 0 and b = 'foo'"),
  321: 
  322:             {ok, ResultTable} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select c from final where c < 20"),
  323: 
  324:             Res = sql_latency_test_case(contraction, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS, Initial, ResultTable, [{a, 1}, {b, "foo"}, {c, 0}]),
  325:             write_csv(sql_join_queries, contraction, Res, ?TRIM);
  326: 
  327:         _ -> ok
  328:     end.
  329: 
  330: sql_join_uncontracted_latency_test(_Config) ->
  331:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  332:         true ->
  333:             %% Topology.
  334:             Initial = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(initial),
  335:             Final = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(final),
  336:             {ok, _} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Final,
  337:                                                         "select a, b, c from initial where a > 0 and b = 'foo'"),
  338: 
  339:             {ok, ResultTable} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select c from final where c < 20"),
  340: 
  341:             Res = sql_latency_test_case(no_contraction, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS, Initial, ResultTable, [{a, 1}, {b, "foo"}, {c, 0}]),
  342:             write_csv(sql_join_queries, no_contraction, Res, ?TRIM);
  343: 
  344:         _ -> ok
  345:     end.
  346: 
  347: generate_path(N, Type) ->
  348:     [_|Tail]=Ids = lists:map(fun(_) ->
  349:         {ok, {Id, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(Type),
  350:         Id
  351:     end, lists:seq(1, N)),
  352:     zipwith(fun(L, R) ->
  353:         lasp:bind_to(R, L)
  354:     end, Ids, Tail),
  355:     Ids.
  356: 
  357: zipwith(Fn, [X | Xs], [Y | Ys]) ->
  358:     [Fn(X, Y) | zipwith(Fn, Xs, Ys)];
  359: 
  360: zipwith(Fn, _, _) when is_function(Fn, 2) -> [].
  361: 
  362: sql_latency_test_case(Optimization, Iterations, From, To, Mutation) ->
  363:     case Optimization of
  364:         no_contraction ->
  365:             %% Disable automatic contraction
  366:             lasp_config:set(automatic_contraction, false),
  367:             %% Force a full cleaving before starting the test
  368:             lasp_dependence_dag:cleave_all();
  369:         contraction ->
  370:             %% Enable automatic contraction
  371:             lasp_config:set(automatic_contraction, true),
  372:             %% Force a contraction before starting the test
  373:             lasp_dependence_dag:contract()
  374:     end,
  375:     sql_run_case(Iterations, [], From, To, Mutation, undefined).
  376: 
  377: sql_run_case(0, Acc, _, _, _, _) -> lists:reverse(Acc);
  378: sql_run_case(Iterations, Acc, From, To, Row, Threshold0) ->
  379:     Threshold = {strict, Threshold0},
  380:     MutateAndRead = fun(F, T, R, Th) ->
  381:         lasp_sql_materialized_view:insert_row(F, R),
  382:         lasp:read(T, Th)
  383:     end,
  384:     {Time, {ok, {_, _, _, NewThreshold}}} = timer:tc(MutateAndRead, [From, To, Row, Threshold]),
  385:     sql_run_case(Iterations - 1, [Time | Acc], From, To, Row, NewThreshold).
  386: 
  387: write_csv(Dir, Option, Cases, Trim) ->
  388:     Path = code:priv_dir(lasp)
  389:            ++ "/evaluation/logs/"
  390:            ++ atom_to_list(Dir) ++ "/"
  391:            ++ atom_to_list(Option) ++ "/"
  392:            ++ integer_to_list(timestamp()) ++ "/",
  393:     ok = filelib:ensure_dir(Path),
  394:     Trimmed = case Trim of
  395:         {trim, Start, End} -> lists:sublist(Cases, Start + 1, (length(Cases) - (Start + End)));
  396:         _ -> Cases
  397:     end,
  398:     lists:foreach(fun(Case) ->
  399:         file:write_file(Path ++ "runner.csv", io_lib:fwrite("~p\n", [Case]), [append])
  400:     end, Trimmed).
  401: 
  402: timestamp() ->
  403:     {Mega, Sec, _Micro} = erlang:timestamp(),
  404:     Mega * 1000000 + Sec.
  405: 
  406: %% @doc Increment counter and test stream behaviour.
  407: stream_test(_Config) ->
  408:     %% Declare a variable.
  409:     {ok, {C1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?COUNTER),
  410: 
  411:     %% Stream results.
  412:     Self = self(),
  413:     Function = fun(V) ->
  414:                        Self ! {ok, V}
  415:                end,
  416:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:stream(C1, Function)),
  417: 
  418:     %% Increment.
  419:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(C1, increment, a)),
  420: 
  421:     %% Wait for message.
  422:     receive
  423:         {ok, 1} ->
  424:             ok
  425:     after
  426:         300 ->
  427:             ct:fail(missing_first_message)
  428:     end,
  429: 
  430:     %% Increment again.
  431:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(C1, increment, b)),
  432: 
  433:     %% Wait for message.
  434:     receive
  435:         {ok, 2} ->
  436:             ok
  437:     after
  438:         300 ->
  439:             ct:fail(missing_second_message)
  440:     end.
  441: 
  442: %% @doc Test query functionality.
  443: query_test(_Config) ->
  444:     %% Declare a variable.
  445:     {ok, {I1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(ivar),
  446: 
  447:     %% Change it's value.
  448:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(I1, {set, 2}, a)),
  449: 
  450:     %% Threshold read just to create a synchronization point for the
  451:     %% value to change.
  452:     {ok, _} = lasp:read(I1, {strict, undefined}),
  453: 
  454:     %% Query it.
  455:     ?assertMatch({ok, 2}, lasp:query(I1)),
  456: 
  457:     ok.
  458: 
  459: %% @doc Single-assignment variable test.
  460: ivar_test(_Config) ->
  461:     %% Single-assignment variables.
  462:     {ok, {I1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(ivar),
  463:     {ok, {I2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(ivar),
  464:     {ok, {I3, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(ivar),
  465: 
  466:     V1 = 1,
  467: 
  468:     %% Attempt pre, and post- dataflow variable bind operations.
  469:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:bind_to(I2, I1)),
  470:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(I1, {set, V1}, a)),
  471:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:bind_to(I3, I1)),
  472: 
  473:     timer:sleep(4000),
  474: 
  475:     %% Verify the same value is contained by all.
  476:     ?assertMatch({ok, {_, _, _, {_, V1}}}, lasp:read(I3, {strict, undefined})),
  477:     ?assertMatch({ok, {_, _, _, {_, V1}}}, lasp:read(I2, {strict, undefined})),
  478:     ?assertMatch({ok, {_, _, _, {_, V1}}}, lasp:read(I1, {strict, undefined})),
  479: 
  480:     ok.
  481: 
  482: %% @doc Map operation test.
  483: map_test(_Config) ->
  484:     %% Create initial set.
  485:     {ok, {S1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  486: 
  487:     %% Add elements to initial set and update.
  488:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [1,2,3]}, a)),
  489: 
  490:     %% Create second set.
  491:     {ok, {S2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  492: 
  493:     %% Apply map.
  494:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:map(S1, fun(X) -> X * 2 end, S2)),
  495: 
  496:     %% Wait.
  497:     timer:sleep(4000),
  498: 
  499:     %% Bind again.
  500:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [4,5,6]}, a)),
  501: 
  502:     %% Wait.
  503:     timer:sleep(4000),
  504: 
  505:     %% Read resulting value.
  506:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1V4}} = lasp:read(S1, {strict, undefined}),
  507: 
  508:     %% Read resulting value.
  509:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2V1}} = lasp:read(S2, {strict, undefined}),
  510: 
  511:     ?assertEqual({ok, sets:from_list([1,2,3,4,5,6]), sets:from_list([2,4,6,8,10,12])},
  512:                  {ok, lasp_type:query(?SET, S1V4), lasp_type:query(?SET, S2V1)}),
  513: 
  514:     ok.
  515: 
  516: %% @doc Filter operation test.
  517: filter_test(_Config) ->
  518:     %% Create initial set.
  519:     {ok, {S1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  520: 
  521:     %% Add elements to initial set and update.
  522:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [1,2,3]}, a)),
  523: 
  524:     %% Create second set.
  525:     {ok, {S2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  526: 
  527:     %% Apply filter.
  528:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:filter(S1, fun(X) -> X rem 2 == 0 end, S2)),
  529: 
  530:     %% Wait.
  531:     timer:sleep(4000),
  532: 
  533:     %% Bind again.
  534:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [4,5,6]}, a)),
  535: 
  536:     %% Wait.
  537:     timer:sleep(4000),
  538: 
  539:     %% Read resulting value.
  540:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1V4}} = lasp:read(S1, {strict, undefined}),
  541: 
  542:     %% Read resulting value.
  543:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2V1}} = lasp:read(S2, {strict, undefined}),
  544: 
  545:     ?assertEqual({ok, sets:from_list([1,2,3,4,5,6]), sets:from_list([2,4,6])},
  546:                  {ok, lasp_type:query(?SET, S1V4), lasp_type:query(?SET, S2V1)}),
  547: 
  548:     ok.
  549: 
  550: %% @doc Union operation test.
  551: union_test(_Config) ->
  552:     %% Create initial sets.
  553:     {ok, {S1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  554:     {ok, {S2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  555: 
  556:     %% Create output set.
  557:     {ok, {S3, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  558: 
  559:     %% Populate initial sets.
  560:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [1,2,3]}, a)),
  561:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S2, {add_all, [a,b,c]}, a)),
  562: 
  563:     %% Apply union.
  564:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:union(S1, S2, S3)),
  565: 
  566:     %% Sleep.
  567:     timer:sleep(400),
  568: 
  569:     %% Read union.
  570:     {ok, {_, _, _, Union0}} = lasp:read(S3, undefined),
  571: 
  572:     %% Read union value.
  573:     Union = lasp_type:query(?SET, Union0),
  574: 
  575:     ?assertEqual({ok, sets:from_list([1,2,3,a,b,c])}, {ok, Union}),
  576: 
  577:     ok.
  578: 
  579: %% @doc Intersection test.
  580: intersection_test(_Config) ->
  581:     %% Create initial sets.
  582:     {ok, {S1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  583:     {ok, {S2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  584: 
  585:     %% Create output set.
  586:     {ok, {S3, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  587: 
  588:     %% Populate initial sets.
  589:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [1,2,3]}, a)),
  590:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S2, {add_all, [a,b,3]}, a)),
  591: 
  592:     %% Apply intersection.
  593:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:intersection(S1, S2, S3)),
  594: 
  595:     %% Sleep.
  596:     timer:sleep(400),
  597: 
  598:     %% Read intersection.
  599:     {ok, {_, _, _, Intersection0}} = lasp:read(S3, undefined),
  600: 
  601:     %% Read intersection value.
  602:     Intersection = lasp_type:query(?SET, Intersection0),
  603: 
  604:     ?assertEqual({ok, sets:from_list([3])}, {ok, Intersection}),
  605: 
  606:     ok.
  607: 
  608: %% @doc Cartesian product test.
  609: product_test(_Config) ->
  610:     %% Create initial sets.
  611:     {ok, {S1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  612:     {ok, {S2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  613: 
  614:     %% Create output set.
  615:     {ok, {S3, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  616: 
  617:     %% Populate initial sets.
  618:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [1,2,3]}, a)),
  619:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S2, {add_all, [a,b,3]}, a)),
  620: 
  621:     %% Apply product.
  622:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:product(S1, S2, S3)),
  623: 
  624:     %% Sleep.
  625:     timer:sleep(400),
  626: 
  627:     %% Read product.
  628:     {ok, {_, _, _, Product0}} = lasp:read(S3, undefined),
  629: 
  630:     %% Read product value.
  631:     Product = lasp_type:query(?SET, Product0),
  632: 
  633:     ?assertEqual({ok,sets:from_list([{1,3},{1,a},{1,b},{2,3},{2,a},{2,b},{3,3},{3,a},{3,b}])}, {ok, Product}),
  634: 
  635:     ok.
  636: 
  637: %% @doc Monotonic read.
  638: monotonic_read_test(_Config) ->
  639:     %% Create new set-based CRDT.
  640:     {ok, {SetId, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  641: 
  642:     %% Determine my pid.
  643:     Me = self(),
  644: 
  645:     %% Perform 4 binds, each an inflation.
  646:     ?assertMatch({ok, _},
  647:                  lasp:update(SetId, {add_all, [1]}, actor)),
  648: 
  649:     {ok, {_, _, _, V0}} = lasp:update(SetId, {add_all, [2]}, actor),
  650: 
  651:     ?assertMatch({ok, {_, _, _, _}},
  652:                  lasp:update(SetId, {add_all, [3]}, actor)),
  653: 
  654:     %% Spawn fun which should block until lattice is strict inflation of
  655:     %% V0.
  656:     I1 = first_read,
  657:     spawn(fun() -> Me ! {I1, lasp:read(SetId, {strict, V0})} end),
  658: 
  659:     %% Ensure we receive [1, 2, 3].
  660:     Set1 = receive
  661:         {I1, {ok, {_, _, _, X}}} ->
  662:             lasp_type:query(?SET, X)
  663:     end,
  664: 
  665:     %% Perform more inflations.
  666:     {ok, {_, _, _, V1}} = lasp:update(SetId, {add_all, [4]}, actor),
  667: 
  668:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(SetId, {add_all, [5]}, actor)),
  669: 
  670:     %% Spawn fun which should block until lattice is a strict inflation
  671:     %% of V1.
  672:     I2 = second_read,
  673:     spawn(fun() -> Me ! {I2, lasp:read(SetId, {strict, V1})} end),
  674: 
  675:     %% Ensure we receive [1, 2, 3, 4].
  676:     Set2 = receive
  677:         {I2, {ok, {_, _, _, Y}}} ->
  678:             lasp_type:query(?SET, Y)
  679:     end,
  680: 
  681:     ?assertEqual({sets:from_list([1,2,3]), sets:from_list([1,2,3,4,5])},
  682:                  {Set1, Set2}),
  683: 
  684:     ok.
  685: 
  686: %% @doc Dynamic variable test.
  687: dynamic_ivar_test(Config) ->
  688:     [Node1, Node2 | _Nodes] = proplists:get_value(nodes, Config),
  689: 
  690:     %% Setup a dynamic variable.
  691:     {ok, {Id, _, _, Value}} = rpc:call(Node1, lasp, declare_dynamic,
  692:                                        [?ID, ivar]),
  693: 
  694:     %% Now, the following action should be idempotent.
  695:     {ok, {Id, _, _, Value}} = rpc:call(Node2, lasp, declare_dynamic,
  696:                                        [?ID, ivar]),
  697: 
  698:     %% Bind node 1's name to the value on node 1: this should not
  699:     %% trigger a broadcast message because the variable is dynamic.
  700:     ?assertMatch({ok, {Id, _, _, {_, Node1}}},
  701:                  rpc:call(Node1, lasp, bind, [{?ID, ivar}, {state_ivar, Node1}])),
  702: 
  703:     %% Bind node 2's name to the value on node 2: this should not
  704:     %% trigger a broadcast message because the variable is dynamic.
  705:     ?assertMatch({ok, {Id, _, _, {_, Node2}}},
  706:                  rpc:call(Node2, lasp, bind, [{?ID, ivar}, {state_ivar, Node2}])),
  707: 
  708:     %% Verify variable has the correct value.
  709:     {ok, Node1} = rpc:call(Node1, lasp, query, [{?ID, ivar}]),
  710: 
  711:     %% Verify variable has the correct value.
  712:     {ok, Node2} = rpc:call(Node2, lasp, query, [{?ID, ivar}]),
  713: 
  714:     ok.
  715: 
  716: %% @doc Test of the orset.
  717: orset_test(_Config) ->
  718:     {ok, {L1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  719:     {ok, {L2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  720:     {ok, {L3, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  721: 
  722:     %% Attempt pre, and post- dataflow variable bind operations.
  723:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:bind_to(L2, L1)),
  724:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2}} = lasp:update(L1, {add, 1}, a),
  725:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:bind_to(L3, L1)),
  726: 
  727:     timer:sleep(4000),
  728: 
  729:     %% Verify the same value is contained by all.
  730:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1}} = lasp:read(L3, {strict, undefined}),
  731:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1}} = lasp:read(L2, {strict, undefined}),
  732:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1}} = lasp:read(L1, {strict, undefined}),
  733: 
  734:     Self = self(),
  735: 
  736:     spawn_link(fun() ->
  737:                   {ok, _} = lasp:wait_needed(L1, {strict, S1}),
  738:                   Self ! threshold_met
  739:                end),
  740: 
  741:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:bind(L1, S2)),
  742: 
  743:     timer:sleep(4000),
  744: 
  745:     %% Verify the same value is contained by all.
  746:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2L3}} = lasp:read(L3, {strict, undefined}),
  747:     ?assertEqual(S2L3, lasp_type:merge(?SET, S2, S2L3)),
  748:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2L2}} = lasp:read(L2, {strict, undefined}),
  749:     ?assertEqual(S2L2, lasp_type:merge(?SET, S2, S2L2)),
  750:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2L1}} = lasp:read(L1, {strict, undefined}),
  751:     ?assertEqual(S2L1, lasp_type:merge(?SET, S2, S2L1)),
  752: 
  753:     %% Read at the S2 threshold level.
  754:     {ok, {_, _, _, _}} = lasp:read(L1, S2),
  755: 
  756:     %% Wait for wait_needed to unblock.
  757:     receive
  758:         threshold_met ->
  759:             ok
  760:     end,
  761: 
  762:     {ok, {L5, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  763:     {ok, {L6, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  764: 
  765:     spawn_link(fun() ->
  766:                 {ok, _} = lasp:read_any([{L5, {strict, undefined}}, {L6, {strict, undefined}}]),
  767:                 Self ! read_any
  768:         end),
  769: 
  770:     {ok, _} = lasp:update(L5, {add, 1}, a),
  771: 
  772:     receive
  773:         read_any ->
  774:             ok
  775:     end,
  776: 
  777:     ok.
  778: 
  779: %% @doc Enforce once test.
  780: enforce_once_test(Config) ->
  781:     Manager = lasp_peer_service:manager(),
  782:     lager:info("Manager: ~p", [Manager]),
  783: 
  784:     Nodes = proplists:get_value(nodes, Config),
  785:     lager:info("Nodes: ~p", [Nodes]),
  786:     Node = hd(lists:usort(Nodes)),
  787: 
  788:     lager:info("Waiting for cluster to stabilize."),
  789:     timer:sleep(10000),
  790: 
  791:     %% Declare the object first: if not, invariant can't be registered.
  792:     Id = {<<"object">>, ?COUNTER_TYPE},
  793:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, declare, [Id, ?COUNTER_TYPE]),
  794: 
  795:     %% Define an enforce-once invariant.
  796:     Self = self(),
  797:     Threshold = {value, 1},
  798: 
  799:     EnforceFun = fun(X) ->
  800:                          lager:info("Enforce function fired with: ~p", [X]),
  801:                          Self ! {ok, Threshold}
  802:                  end,
  803: 
  804:     lager:info("Adding invariant on node: ~p!", [Node]),
  805: 
  806:     case rpc:call(Node, lasp, enforce_once, [Id, Threshold, EnforceFun]) of
  807:         ok ->
  808:             lager:info("Invariant configured!");
  809:         Error ->
  810:             lager:info("Invariant can't be configured: ~p", [Error]),
  811:             ct:fail(failed)
  812:     end,
  813: 
  814:     %% Increment counter twice to get trigger to fire.
  815:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, update, [Id, increment, self()]),
  816:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, update, [Id, increment, self()]),
  817: 
  818:     lager:info("Waiting for response..."),
  819:     receive
  820:         {ok, Threshold} ->
  821:             ok
  822:     after
  823:         10000 ->
  824:             lager:info("Did not receive response!"),
  825:             ct:fail(failed)
  826:     end,
  827: 
  828:     lager:info("Finished enforce_once test."),
  829: 
  830:     ok.
  831: 
  832: %% @doc Membership test.
  833: membership_test(Config) ->
  834:     Manager = lasp_peer_service:manager(),
  835:     ct:pal("Manager: ~p", [Manager]),
  836: 
  837:     Nodes = proplists:get_value(nodes, Config),
  838:     lager:info("Nodes: ~p", [Nodes]),
  839:     Sorted = lists:usort(Nodes),
  840: 
  841:     lager:info("Waiting for cluster to stabilize."),
  842:     timer:sleep(10000),
  843: 
  844:     case Manager of
  845:         partisan_hyparview_peer_service_manager ->
  846:             lists:foreach(fun(Node) ->
  847:                                 {ok, Active} = rpc:call(Node, Manager, active, []),
  848:                                 {ok, Passive} = rpc:call(Node, Manager, passive, []),
  849: 
  850:                                 case lists:usort([Name || {Name, _, _} <- sets:to_list(Active)]) of
  851:                                     Sorted ->
  852:                                         ok;
  853:                                     WrongActive ->
  854:                                         ct:fail("Incorrect nodes in active view on node ~p: ~p should be ~p!",
  855:                                                 [Node, WrongActive, Sorted])
  856:                                 end,
  857: 
  858:                                 case sets:to_list(Passive) of
  859:                                     [] ->
  860:                                         ok;
  861:                                     WrongPassive ->
  862:                                         ct:fail("Incorrect nodes in passive view: ~p!",
  863:                                                 [WrongPassive])
  864:                                 end
  865:                           end, Nodes);
  866:         partisan_default_peer_service_manager ->
  867:             lists:foreach(fun(Node) ->
  868:                                 {ok, Members} = rpc:call(Node, Manager, members, []),
  869:                                 lists:usort(Members) =:= lists:usort(Nodes)
  870:                           end, Nodes);
  871:         partisan_client_server_peer_service_manager ->
  872:             lists:foreach(fun(Node) ->
  873:                                 {ok, Members} = rpc:call(Node, Manager, members, []),
  874:                                 lists:usort(Members) =:= lists:usort(Nodes)
  875:                           end, Nodes)
  876:     end,
  877: 
  878:     ok.
  879: 
  880: %% @doc Test of the add-wins set.
  881: awset_ps_test(_Config) ->
  882:     {ok, {L1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?AWSET_PS),
  883:     {ok, {L2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?AWSET_PS),
  884:     {ok, {L3, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?AWSET_PS),
  885: 
  886:     %% Attempt pre, and post- dataflow variable bind operations.
  887:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:bind_to(L2, L1)),
  888:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2}} = lasp:update(L1, {add, 1}, a),
  889:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:bind_to(L3, L1)),
  890: 
  891:     timer:sleep(4000),
  892: 
  893:     %% Verify the same value is contained by all.
  894:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1}} = lasp:read(L3, {strict, undefined}),
  895:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1}} = lasp:read(L2, {strict, undefined}),
  896:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1}} = lasp:read(L1, {strict, undefined}),
  897: 
  898:     Self = self(),
  899: 
  900:     spawn_link(fun() ->
  901:                   {ok, _} = lasp:wait_needed(L1, {strict, S1}),
  902:                   Self ! threshold_met
  903:                end),
  904: 
  905:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:bind(L1, S2)),
  906: 
  907:     timer:sleep(4000),
  908: 
  909:     %% Verify the same value is contained by all.
  910:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2L3}} = lasp:read(L3, {strict, undefined}),
  911:     ?assertEqual(S2L3, lasp_type:merge(?AWSET_PS, S2, S2L3)),
  912:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2L2}} = lasp:read(L2, {strict, undefined}),
  913:     ?assertEqual(S2L2, lasp_type:merge(?AWSET_PS, S2, S2L2)),
  914:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2L1}} = lasp:read(L1, {strict, undefined}),
  915:     ?assertEqual(S2L1, lasp_type:merge(?AWSET_PS, S2, S2L1)),
  916: 
  917:     %% Read at the S2 threshold level.
  918:     {ok, {_, _, _, _}} = lasp:read(L1, S2),
  919: 
  920:     %% Wait for wait_needed to unblock.
  921:     receive
  922:         threshold_met ->
  923:             ok
  924:     end,
  925: 
  926:     {ok, {L5, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?AWSET_PS),
  927:     {ok, {L6, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?AWSET_PS),
  928: 
  929:     spawn_link(fun() ->
  930:                 {ok, _} = lasp:read_any([{L5, {strict, undefined}}, {L6, {strict, undefined}}]),
  931:                 Self ! read_any
  932:         end),
  933: 
  934:     {ok, _} = lasp:update(L5, {add, 1}, a),
  935: 
  936:     receive
  937:         read_any ->
  938:             ok
  939:     end.
